Context:
* The group aims to teach skills for reducing stress, anxiety, and finding inner calm.
* No prior experience with mindfulness is required to participate.
* Participants can join at any time and attend as many weeks as they can.
* For more details and registration, refer to the form provided.
* George Brown College offers various wellness skill-building groups.
* Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* Social media hub link provided twice.
* Information on land acknowledgment available.
* Sign up to receive college news and updates.
